name: Mealogic, Inc.
description: Operator of a meal discovery platform intended to offer professionally prepared healthy meals. The company specializes in offering personalized meals pre-made and designed by local dietitians, nutritionists and chefs using good quality, sustainably sourced ingredients free of refined sugars, gluten and dairy for health-conscious consumers, enabling customers to indulge in freshly prepared food delivered to their doorstep.
one_liner: Operator of a meal discovery platform intended to offer professionally prepared healthy meals. The company specializes in offering personalized meals pre-made and designed by local dietitians, nutritionists and chefs using good quality, sustainably sourced ingredients free of refined sugars, gluten and dairy for health-conscious consumers, enabling customers to indulge in freshly prepared food delivered to their doorstep.
